plugins.prepareCmd: sed -i 's/^version = ".*"/version = "${nextRelease.version}"/' Cargo.toml && cargo build --quiet && git add Cargo.lock && cd ../envcheck-npm && npm version ${nextRelease.version} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json
plugins.publishCmd: cargo publish --token ${process.env.CARGO_REGISTRY_TOKEN} --allow-dirty && cd ../envcheck-npm && npm publish --access public
